dialogueTree.title: Tiago: ""Oh hey, wey. There's coffee in the..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh hey, wey. There's coffee in the back... Oh, wait, I meant the Mother's love."

links.title: Reaction Speed: ""Coffee in the back"? Something fam..."
links.text: "Coffee in the back"? Something familiar about that. Coffee and stale cookies...

links.title: You: ""Have you by any chance heard the *..."
links.text: "Have you by any chance heard the *viejita* say the password to her radiocomputer?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Too many times, ese. You need it f..."
links.text: "Too many times, ese. You need it for something?"

links.title: Drama: "*Sssurveys* are a good way to fish..."
links.text: *Sssurveys* are a good way to fish for personal information, especially in the name of public sssafety...

links.title: You: ""I'm doing a survey of passwords an..."
links.text: "I'm doing a survey of passwords and passcodes, identifying regional trends. In the interests of public safety, of course."

links.title: Tiago: ""Don't sweat it, vato. The password..."
links.text: "Don't sweat it, vato. The password is 'AFTER LIFE DEATH.'"

links.title: Inland Empire: "That is true. But what comes after..."
links.text: That is true. But what comes after death?

links.title: Tiago: ""What'd you think of that? Makes me..."
links.text: "What'd you think of that? Makes me almost pity *la nihilista peque√±a* when I hear it."

links.title: You: ""Just tell me what's the password."..."
links.text: "Just tell me what's the password." (Step closer.)

links.title: You: ""Yes, it's for a first-degree murde..."
links.text: "Yes, it's for a first-degree murder investigation in Martinaise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his eyebrow,..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises his eyebrow, but doesn't say anything.

links.title: You: ""Honestly I just want to break into..."
links.text: "Honestly I just want to break into a radiocomputer, see what's on it."

links.title: Suggestion: "No need to overdo it. He won't mind..."
links.text: No need to overdo it. He won't mind sharing it with you.

links.title: You: ""You've been here a long time. Do y..."
links.text: "You've been here a long time. Do you know why the church was abandoned?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Police raid a while back," he resp..."
links.text: "Police raid a while back," he responds, his voice suddenly flat.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you witness it?""
links.text: "Did you witness it?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Not really, or at least I don't re..."
links.text: "Not really, or at least I don't remember much of it anymore. The Mother's Love has done its job... That's what's so great about the Mother -- it lets you forget about everything."

links.title: Suggestion: "Could it be that he just doesn't wa..."
links.text: Could it be that he just doesn't want to discuss a police raid with another police officer?

links.title: Logic: "It looks like he truly doesn't reme..."
links.text: It looks like he truly doesn't remember. There's a vagueness to his sense of time.

links.title: You: ""Did you see what happened?""
links.text: "Did you see what happened?"

links.title: You: ""You've been here for a long time...."
links.text: "You've been here for a long time. Did you see the police raid that took place here?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Something like that," he responds,..."
links.text: "Something like that," he responds, his voice suddenly flat.

links.title: You: ""What are you doing here?""
links.text: "What are you doing here?"

links.title: Tiago: ""This is a special place. There's a..."
links.text: "This is a special place. There's a perforation in the world up there. A way out, into nothingness." He nods toward the ceiling. "This church was built around it, for purposes of veneration."

links.title: Tiago: ""I circle it, nurtured by the silen..."
links.text: "I circle it, nurtured by the silence bestowed by the Mother. One of these days, I'll be pure enough to go drink from it directly."

links.title: Conceptualization: "He said something about "saeraffic..."
links.text: He said something about "saeraffic existence" before. Maybe this is what he was talking about?

links.title: You: ""You sure you didn't just switch on..."
links.text: "You sure you didn't just switch one drug for another?"

links.title: Tiago: ""It's not like that at all, man. It..."
links.text: "It's not like that at all, man. It's just faith and joyful service."

links.title: Drama: "Too gleeful, those words -- he is l..."
links.text: Too gleeful, those words -- he is lying. Not to you -- to his very own self.

links.title: You: ""Faith is a kind of drug.""
links.text: "Faith is a kind of drug."

links.title: Tiago: ""I've heard that before, wey." He s..."
links.text: "I've heard that before, wey." He shakes his head. "And I know I can't convince you on the spot. But think -- when's the last time you woke up from *silent communion* with a hangover, regretting what you did last night?"

links.title: Empathy: "There are drugs darker than alcohol..."
links.text: There are drugs darker than alcohol circling your system.

links.title: You: ""Hey, not judging -- I've got drug..."
links.text: "Hey, not judging -- I've got drug problems myself."

links.title: Tiago: ""I can see, and it saddens me. But..."
links.text: "I can see, and it saddens me. But devotion can save you -- it saved me."

links.title: You: ""I think love might have been my dr..."
links.text: "I think love might have been my drug of choice. And I think I'm still hungover from it."

links.title: Tiago: ""She took you for a good spin, huh?..."
links.text: "She took you for a good spin, huh?" He looks at you gravely. "Don't worry, bro, that love is but a drop compared to the ocean of the Mother's love..."

links.title: Tiago: ""...the Mother will eat all of you,..."
links.text: "...the Mother will eat all of you, and never spit you out."

links.title: You: ""I guess you have a point." (Procee..."
links.text: "I guess you have a point." (Proceed.)

links.title: Tiago: ""I know it'll take time. Don't swea..."
links.text: "I know it'll take time. Don't sweat it."

links.title: You: ""Let's agree to disagree." (Proceed..."
links.text: "Let's agree to disagree." (Proceed.)

links.title: You: ""I was being insensitive. Sorry. Le..."
links.text: "I was being insensitive. Sorry. Let's move on." (Proceed.)

links.title: Tiago: ""No worries, man. I know this shit..."
links.text: "No worries, man. I know this shit takes time."

links.title: You: ""Who's this Mother of Silence you k..."
links.text: "Who's this Mother of Silence you keep talking about?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Oh, that's no simple question, ese..."
links.text: "Oh, that's no simple question, ese. She is one who can't be painted or sculpted..."

links.title: Tiago: ""She is a cavity, in the dark, beyo..."
links.text: "She is a cavity, in the dark, beyond sense. She saved me... but I couldn't describe her to you. No one can, homes, and no one ever will."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "His adoration is beyond sexual. Thi..."
links.text: His adoration is beyond sexual. This cavity is something that no human form has.

links.title: You: ""What will happen once you drink fr..."
links.text: "What will happen once you drink from this 'perforation'?"

links.title: Tiago: ""I will be incinerated, but not des..."
links.text: "I will be incinerated, but not destroyed -- finally at one with the state of the world before reality began."

links.title: Rhetoric: "That sounds a *bit* like substituti..."
links.text: That sounds a *bit* like substitution behaviour, no? You know a thing or two about that...

links.title: You: ""Is this what you meant by 'saeraff..."
links.text: "Is this what you meant by 'saeraffic existence'?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Right on, homes. You're catching o..."
links.text: "Right on, homes. You're catching on. Yeah, you see, I'm sort of a saeraff to the Mother... I sing her glory."

links.title: You: ""Can you sing for me? Sing for me s..."
links.text: "Can you sing for me? Sing for me something."

links.title: Tiago: ""I ain't from no *marietti*, if tha..."
links.text: "I ain't from no *marietti*, if that's what you're thinking. And the song I sing is silent as the Mother."

links.title: Encyclopedia: ""Marietti" is a Mesque style of mus..."
links.text: "Marietti" is a Mesque style of music and dance commonly seen at all manner of festivities -- especially weddings. It's delightfully quaint, owing to its peasant origins.

links.title: Composure: "He lost his cool there for a moment..."
links.text: He lost his cool there for a moment. Seems you hit some nerve.

links.title: Logic: "Wait, he says he didn't remember an..."
links.text: Wait, he says he didn't remember anything about being Mesque -- and now he remembers this?

links.title: You: ""I thought you said you didn't reme..."
links.text: "I thought you said you didn't remember what it meant to be Mesque."

links.title: Tiago: ""Things come back... in flashes." H..."
links.text: "Things come back... in flashes." He thinks for a moment. "When something reminds me... Sometimes they even seem important again. *Really* important. But then, thanks to the Mother, they're gone again."

links.title: You: "Accept this contradiction. The man'..."
links.text: Accept this contradiction. The man's obviously deranged.

links.title: Tiago: ""But I was talking about the singin..."
links.text: "But I was talking about the singing of a burning heart... You may be thinking, 'But fire crackles!' No, homes, that's the material that's burning. The flames themselves are without sound."

links.title: You: ""Did you suffer some singing traged..."
links.text: "Did you suffer some singing tragedy?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Maybe I did." He sighs. "It don't..."
links.text: "Maybe I did." He sighs. "It don't matter no more."

links.title: You: ""I recently tore it up on the stage..."
links.text: "I recently tore it up on the stage with my singing."

links.title: Tiago: ""Good for you, man. But you must kn..."
links.text: "Good for you, man. But you must know that nothing you achieve's gonna make you happy and loved like you think you wanna be -- comes with being a slave to *el vino*."

links.title: Tiago: ""If you could submit to the mother..."
links.text: "If you could submit to the mother -- sing her praises with your burning heart -- you could be free from selfish desire."

links.title: You: "Don't rub it in."
links.text: Don't rub it in.

links.title: You: ""I recently suffered a singing trag..."
links.text: "I recently suffered a singing tragedy myself."

links.title: Tiago: ""What you're suffering from is *el..."
links.text: "What you're suffering from is *el vino*-- it's left you alone with your selfishness. That's your tragedy, wey."

links.title: You: "You don't need to share your shame."
links.text: You don't need to share your shame.

links.title: You: ""That seems to upset you. But you s..."
links.text: "That seems to upset you. But you said you didn't really remember your past."

links.title: Tiago: "He sighs. "Things come back... in f..."
links.text: He sighs. "Things come back... in flashes. When something reminds me... Sometimes they even seem important again. *Really* important. But then, thanks to the Mother, they're gone again."

links.title: You: ""I was rude. I'm sorry.""
links.text: "I was rude. I'm sorry."

links.title: Tiago: "He sighs. "It don't matter none, ho..."
links.text: He sighs. "It don't matter none, homes. Not anymore."

links.title: You: ""It doesn't really make sense for y..."
links.text: "It doesn't really make sense for you to sing if she's the Mother of *Silence*."

links.title: Tiago: "He laughs. "I don't mean *literal*..."
links.text: He laughs. "I don't mean *literal* singing, homes. This is the Mother of Silence we're talking about. It's the singing of a burning heart..."

links.title: Tiago: ""...you may be thinking, 'But fire..."
links.text: "...you may be thinking, 'But fire crackles!' No, homes, that's the material that's burning. The flames themselves are without sound."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Singing is good. We should..."
links.text: (Nod.) "Singing is good. We should all sing a bit more."

links.title: You: ""I still don't understand what you'..."
links.text: "I still don't understand what you're doing in the church."

links.title: Tiago: ""I'm a saeraff, homes. I sing the M..."
links.text: "I'm a saeraff, homes. I sing the Mother's glory."

links.title: You: ""How did you even find this place -..."
links.text: "How did you even find this place -- this church?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Hard to say. I think I did some co..."
links.text: "Hard to say. I think I did some construction work here, back when I still had material worries. Up there, I realized what the true purpose of the church was..."

links.title: Tiago: ""Been spending a lot of time here e..."
links.text: "Been spending a lot of time here ever since. The past is nothing to me now, wey. It didn't belong to me."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hmh... does it mean he witnessed th..."
links.text: Hmh... does it mean he witnessed the police raid?

links.title: You: ""Are these yours?" (Show him the sc..."
links.text: "Are these yours?" (Show him the scarf and shoes you found lying around.)

links.title: Tiago: ""I think they were, a long time ago..."
links.text: "I think they were, a long time ago..." He looks at the red clothing items in your hand. "I had to *shed* them like skins, to get closer to the centre of the silence. You can have them. I don't need them anymore."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "They'd only stop him from climbing."
links.text: They'd only stop him from climbing.

links.title: Composure: "They look pretty dapper actually."
links.text: They look pretty dapper actually.

links.title: You: ""Are these your shoes lying around..."
links.text: "Are these your shoes lying around here?" (Show him the red brogues you found.)

links.title: Tiago: ""I think they were, a long time ago..."
links.text: "I think they were, a long time ago..." He looks at the red brogues in your hand. "I had to *shed* them like skins, to get closer to the centre of the silence. You can have them. I don't need them anymore."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "They'd only stop him from climbing."
links.text: They'd only stop him from climbing.

links.title: Composure: "These shoes look pretty dapper actu..."
links.text: These shoes look pretty dapper actually.

links.title: You: ""Is this your scarf lying around he..."
links.text: "Is this your scarf lying around here?" (Show him the red scarf you found.)

links.title: Tiago: ""I think it was, a long time ago......"
links.text: "I think it was, a long time ago..." He looks at the red winter scarf in your hand. "I had to *shed* it like a skin, to get closer to the centre of the silence. You can have it. I don't need it anymore."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "It'd only stop him from climbing."
links.text: It'd only stop him from climbing.

links.title: Composure: "The scarf looks pretty dapper actua..."
links.text: The scarf looks pretty dapper actually.

links.title: You: ""Right. I had other questions...""
links.text: "Right. I had other questions..."

links.title: You: ""Did you just climb down from the c..."
links.text: "Did you just climb down from the church tower?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Sure did, homes.""
links.text: "Sure did, homes."

links.title: You: ""Are you human? You weren't moving..."
links.text: "Are you human? You weren't moving like a human."

links.title: Tiago: "He chuckles. "I am, at least in par..."
links.text: He chuckles. "I am, at least in part, homes... until the Mother's love burns away the crude distinctions of the body."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "What does he mean 'in part'?"
links.text: What does he mean 'in part'?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "A body is only crude so long as it'..."
links.text: A body is only crude so long as it's unformed, son. That's where your training comes in.

links.title: You: "Yeah! My *body* is my church!"
links.text: Yeah! My *body* is my church!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Tell him, son! Show him you're not..."
links.text: Tell him, son! Show him you're not going to be bent out of shape by his *philosophies*.

links.title: You: "I don't know, I think he may be ont..."
links.text: I don't know, I think he may be onto something.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "What's next? A raw food diet? You'r..."
links.text: What's next? A raw food diet? You're a disappointment.

links.title: You: "I don't want to argue with him. He'..."
links.text: I don't want to argue with him. He's kind of scary.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "What is this? Is this what you've b..."
links.text: What is this? Is this what you've been training for? So you could wuss out when push comes to shove?

links.title: You: ""I think having a body is great! I..."
links.text: "I think having a body is great! I don't want to burn away any of its distinctions!"

links.title: Tiago: ""That's because you're soaked throu..."
links.text: "That's because you're soaked through and through with *al gul*, bro. Keeps you heavy and grounded. Then fools you into thinking that's a *good* thing."

links.title: Tiago: ""If you was to surrender to the Mot..."
links.text: "If you was to surrender to the Mother -- you know, get a taste of *saeraffic* existence -- you'd never wanna go back."

links.title: You: ""Hey, are you a boiadeiro?""
links.text: "Hey, are you a boiadeiro?"

links.title: Tiago: ""A boiadeiro? No, homes. I don't go..."
links.text: "A boiadeiro? No, homes. I don't go in for that kinda thing. It's all about surrendering to the Mother now."

links.title: You: ""You sound like you're not from aro..."
links.text: "You sound like you're not from around here."

links.title: Tiago: ""Haven't you ever met a Mesque befo..."
links.text: "Haven't you ever met a Mesque before, *cabron*? Surprising number of us around Revachol..."

links.title: You: ""And it's great! Such diversity is..."
links.text: "And it's great! Such diversity is a boon to the economy."

links.title: Tiago: "He laughs. "Not sure I'm contributi..."
links.text: He laughs. "Not sure I'm contributing to the economy none, homes."

links.title: You: ""So you're another immigrant, come..."
links.text: "So you're another immigrant, come to take up space and steal jobs..."

links.title: Tiago: ""Space? Jobs?" He laughs. "Do you s..."
links.text: "Space? Jobs?" He laughs. "Do you see anyone taking swings at me for my place on the rafters?..."

links.title: You: ""What's 'Mesque'?""
links.text: "What's 'Mesque'?"

links.title: Tiago: ""You know, I'm not so sure myself a..."
links.text: "You know, I'm not so sure myself anymore." He thinks for a moment. "Don't really matter, though."

links.title: You: ""You talk funny.""
links.text: "You talk funny."

links.title: You: ""Well, at least, you're human. That..."
links.text: "Well, at least, you're human. That's a relief."

links.title: Tiago: ""Glad you're feeling more comfortab..."
links.text: "Glad you're feeling more comfortable." He grins. "First-timers are always nervous."

links.title: You: ""There must be something illegal ab..."
links.text: "There must be something illegal about living in a church ceiling. I don't know what yet, but there must be."

links.title: Tiago: ""Oh, man, I'd love to see that stat..."
links.text: "Oh, man, I'd love to see that statute." He pauses to think. "I'm sure I'd be 'trespassing' if the church was in use -- but it's not, hombre."

links.title: Tiago: ""I've done my share of illegal shit..."
links.text: "I've done my share of illegal shit. Used to be in a gang, the whole deal. But even memories of that time are fading... Most of them are already gone."

links.title: You: "(Shake your head.) "So many people..."
links.text: (Shake your head.) "So many people losing their memory... A certain portent of *doom*..."

links.title: Tiago: ""Naw, ese, it's not like that. Best..."
links.text: "Naw, ese, it's not like that. Best thing that could happen to you -- losing your memory..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you remember your name, sir?""
links.text: "Do you remember your name, sir?"

links.title: Authority: "The lieutenant is not particularly..."
links.text: The lieutenant is not particularly interested in this information. He's just trying to assert some control over the conversation.

links.title: Tiago: ""Tiago is my name. But those syllab..."
links.text: "Tiago is my name. But those syllables don't mean much to me these days. A name isn't just your identity, but also, so to speak..."

links.title: Tiago: ""Tiago's my name, by the way, thoug..."
links.text: "Tiago's my name, by the way, though the syllables don't mean much to me. A name isn't just your identity, but also, so to speak..."

links.title: Tiago: ""...your place among your fellows,..."
links.text: "...your place among your fellows, your place in the world. I ain't got no use for such a place anymore."

links.title: You: ""My name's Harry." (Extend your han..."
links.text: "My name's Harry." (Extend your hand for a greeting.)

links.title: Tiago: ""That's just the thing, homes -- no..."
links.text: "That's just the thing, homes -- none of that *matters*..." He ignores your hand, his limbs a mere shadow below the ceiling.

links.title: You: ""My name sets me apart from my fell..."
links.text: "My name sets me apart from my fellows. How often do you meet a Rapha√´l Ambrosius Costeau?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Don't think I've met one yet, home..."
links.text: "Don't think I've met one yet, homes." He studies you silently for a moment.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his eyebrows..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises his eyebrows and coughs.

links.title: Composure: "That was him suppressing a chuckle."
links.text: That was him suppressing a chuckle.

links.title: You: ""My name's Harrier Du Bois, and my..."
links.text: "My name's Harrier Du Bois, and my place in the world is lieutenant double-yefreitor."

links.title: Tiago: ""That's just the thing, homes -- no..."
links.text: "That's just the thing, homes -- none of that *matters*..." He sounds melancholy saying this, his limbs a mere shadow below the ceiling.

links.title: You: ""Maybe that's why I feel so lonely..."
links.text: "Maybe that's why I feel so lonely -- without a name, I have no place."

links.title: Tiago: ""Don't worry, man, you got a place..."
links.text: "Don't worry, man, you got a place -- right here." He sounds happy saying this, his limbs a mere shadow below the ceiling.

links.title: You: ""I don't do names either. Names are..."
links.text: "I don't do names either. Names are *out*. I don't care what mine is."

links.title: Tiago: ""That's not quite right, but you're..."
links.text: "That's not quite right, but you're getting somewhere." He smiles enigmatically. "Any one of us could have been anything else..."

links.title: Tiago: ""We are all one, who sing the Mothe..."
links.text: "We are all one, who sing the Mother's glory."

links.title: You: ""I lost my memory, too. And it haun..."
links.text: "I lost my memory, too. And it haunts me."

links.title: Tiago: ""No, man. You gotta let that shit g..."
links.text: "No, man. You gotta let that shit go." He looks at you as if he wants to pat you on the back. "Then the Mother's light touch will fill you with rapture..."

links.title: You: ""I lost my memory, too, but I like..."
links.text: "I lost my memory, too, but I like it. It's like I get to create a whole new me, start again from scratch."

links.title: Tiago: ""That's not really the point, ese."..."
links.text: "That's not really the point, ese." He frowns. "You gotta give yourself over to service... Service of the Mother, that is..."

links.title: You: ""So you used to be in a gang, but y..."
links.text: "So you used to be in a gang, but you don't really remember it? Sounds convenient."

links.title: Tiago: ""Convenience has got nothing to do..."
links.text: "Convenience has got nothing to do with what goes on up there..." He gazes up at the ceiling.

links.title: Empathy: "There's a profound longing in that..."
links.text: There's a profound longing in that gaze. Like he wants to be one with whatever is up there, shrouded in darkness.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I have other questions.""
links.text: "Okay, I have other questions."

links.title: Tiago: "The sinewy figure lingers on the wo..."
links.text: The sinewy figure lingers on the wooden beams, blending into the shadows.

links.title: You: ""You must be the crab-man.""
links.text: "You must be the crab-man."

links.title: Tiago: ""Never known myself to be a *crab*...."
links.text: "Never known myself to be a *crab*. But if that's the name you've got for me, I won't stop you from using it."

links.title: You: ""To be fair, it's really more like..."
links.text: "To be fair, it's really more like a spider."

links.title: Tiago: "He considers this for a moment. "I..."
links.text: He considers this for a moment. "I always thought of myself more like a *flame*. Flickering along the rafters and beams." He pauses. "It may be that I gotta work on my technique."

links.title: Logic: "That's not the only technique he's..."
links.text: That's not the only technique he's working on. Look at those carved sculptures. And is that a satchel of tools over there?

links.title: You: ""Wait, did you also carve all those..."
links.text: "Wait, did you also carve all those sculptures?" (Point at the nearest pillar.)

links.title: Tiago: ""Sure am. Whittling wood used to be..."
links.text: "Sure am. Whittling wood used to be something I just did to busy my hands..."

links.title: Tiago: ""...now I use those same hands in s..."
links.text: "...now I use those same hands in service of something greater than my own restlessness."

links.title: Conceptualization: "All right. Let's consider the conte..."
links.text: All right. Let's consider the context and meaning here.

links.title: You: ""I see what you've done there. It's..."
links.text: "I see what you've done there. It's as if these figures are trying to become one with the church -- or perhaps with the Mother herself."

links.title: Tiago: ""It's all just for the Mother, man...."
links.text: "It's all just for the Mother, man. No need to overthink it."

links.title: You: "(Rub your chin.) "You've got some n..."
links.text: (Rub your chin.) "You've got some nice... curves going there."

links.title: You: "(Squint your eyes.) "These seem a t..."
links.text: (Squint your eyes.) "These seem a tad... derivative."

links.title: You: ""You're promoting the objectificati..."
links.text: "You're promoting the objectification of women with your reactionary depiction of female bodies."

links.title: You: ""Honestly, I don't get it. All thes..."
links.text: "Honestly, I don't get it. All these figures look half-finished."

links.title: You: "(Let's keep moving on.) "What were..."
links.text: (Let's keep moving on.) "What were you before you became a crab-man?"

links.title: You: ""What were you before you became a..."
links.text: "What were you before you became a crab-man?"

links.title: Tiago: ""I was in a gang, wey. But my memor..."
links.text: "I was in a gang, wey. But my memories of that time are fading... Most of them are already gone."

links.title: You: ""If you're not a crab, then what ar..."
links.text: "If you're not a crab, then what are you?"

links.title: You: ""Sorry, you just weren't moving lik..."
links.text: "Sorry, you just weren't moving like a human."

links.title: You: ""Hey, it's your neighbours who came..."
links.text: "Hey, it's your neighbours who came up with this name, not me."

links.title: You: ""You know, there are some speedfrea..."
links.text: "You know, there are some speedfreaks around here who call you 'the crab-man'."

links.title: Tiago: ""*Un Cangrejo*!" He laughs. "Never..."
links.text: "*Un Cangrejo*!" He laughs. "Never thought of myself as a crab. More like... a flame flickering among the rafters and beams..." He pauses. "It may be that I gotta work on my technique."

links.title: Logic: "That's not the only technique he's..."
links.text: That's not the only technique he's working on. Look at those carved sculptures. And is that a satchel of tools over there?

links.title: You: ""Wait, did you carve those sculptur..."
links.text: "Wait, did you carve those sculptures?" (Point at the nearest pillar.)

links.title: Tiago: ""Sure am. Whittling wood used to be..."
links.text: "Sure am. Whittling wood used to be something I just did to busy my hands..."

links.title: Tiago: ""...now I use those same hands in s..."
links.text: "...now I use those same hands in service of something greater than my own restlessness."

links.title: Conceptualization: "All right. Let's consider the conte..."
links.text: All right. Let's consider the context and meaning here.

links.title: You: ""I see what you've done there. It's..."
links.text: "I see what you've done there. It's as if these figures are trying to become one with the church -- or perhaps with the Mother herself."

links.title: Tiago: ""It's all just for the Mother, man...."
links.text: "It's all just for the Mother, man. No need to overthink it."

links.title: You: "(Rub your chin.) "You've got some n..."
links.text: (Rub your chin.) "You've got some nice... curves going there."

links.title: You: "(Squint your eyes.) "These seem a t..."
links.text: (Squint your eyes.) "These seem a tad... derivative."

links.title: You: ""You're promoting the objectificati..."
links.text: "You're promoting the objectification of women with your reactionary depiction of female bodies."

links.title: You: ""Honestly, I don't get it. All thes..."
links.text: "Honestly, I don't get it. All these figures look half-finished."

links.title: You: ""I thought you'd be offended. Go an..."
links.text: "I thought you'd be offended. Go and scare them or something."

links.title: Tiago: ""I can't leave my post here." He sm..."
links.text: "I can't leave my post here." He smiles. "Besides, it don't bother me none. Crab's no worse than a man, if you think about it."

links.title: You: ""To be fair, it's really more like..."
links.text: "To be fair, it's really more like a spider. But everyone calls you the crab-man."

links.title: Tiago: ""It don't bother me none. Crab's no..."
links.text: "It don't bother me none. Crab's no worse than a man, if you think about it."

links.title: You: ""Just thought you should know.""
links.text: "Just thought you should know."

links.title: You: ""Some ravers want to turn this plac..."
links.text: "Some ravers want to turn this place into a nightclub."

links.title: Tiago: ""The ones in the tent outside, righ..."
links.text: "The ones in the tent outside, right? I seen 'em. Guessing they're the ones who call me a crab? Probably scared of me..."

links.title: You: ""Wait, do they have *reason* to be..."
links.text: "Wait, do they have *reason* to be scared?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Naw, man. They look pretty funny...."
links.text: "Naw, man. They look pretty funny. And I don't harm no one anymore anyway."

links.title: Half Light: "Though he used to. A long time ago."
links.text: Though he used to. A long time ago.

links.title: You: ""So, what do you think? About the n..."
links.text: "So, what do you think? About the nightclub, that is."

links.title: Tiago: ""Why not? They wouldn't bother me n..."
links.text: "Why not? They wouldn't bother me none. I'm usually way up there, imbibing. Ain't no music on Earth that can reach where I go."

links.title: Tiago: ""Might even be nice to have some co..."
links.text: "Might even be nice to have some company..."

links.title: Empathy: "He said that in spite of himself. H..."
links.text: He said that in spite of himself. He's more attached to the human than he'd like to think.

links.title: You: ""I trust you won't get in the way o..."
links.text: "I trust you won't get in the way of some enterprising youth? Their business looks promising."

links.title: Tiago: ""Wouldn't bother me none to have 'e..."
links.text: "Wouldn't bother me none to have 'em spin music in here. I'm usually way up there, imbibing."

links.title: You: ""Turning a church into a nightclub..."
links.text: "Turning a church into a nightclub -- I have to say it's a great idea. You should support it."

links.title: Tiago: ""Absolutely, man. Wouldn't bother m..."
links.text: "Absolutely, man. Wouldn't bother me none to have 'em spin music in here. I'm usually way up there, imbibing."

links.title: Tiago: ""The ones in the tent outside, righ..."
links.text: "The ones in the tent outside, right? I seen 'em. Think they're scared of me."

links.title: You: ""Do you know where the other spooke..."
links.text: "Do you know where the other spooker is?" (Point at the strange machines around you.)

links.title: Tiago: ""Other spooker? Oh, esa viejita muy..."
links.text: "Other spooker? Oh, esa viejita muy estudiosa!" He laughs. "Dunno, homes."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Viejita is... grandma?"
links.text: Viejita is... grandma?

links.title: You: ""Wait, so there *is* another person..."
links.text: "Wait, so there *is* another person living in the church -- and it's a *viejita*?"

links.title: Tiago: ""No, I just call her 'viejita' beca..."
links.text: "No, I just call her 'viejita' because of her clothes, she's actually quite young..." He scratches his head. "Or maybe not *that* young... Age is just one of the many masks we wear."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, what if it's Ruby?"
links.text: Wait, what if it's Ruby?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did it ever seem to you like she w..."
links.text: "Did it ever seem to you like she was hiding here from something?" The lieutenant seems to be thinking the same. He takes out his little notebook.

links.title: Tiago: ""You mean like a fugitive?" He glan..."
links.text: "You mean like a fugitive?" He glances at the abandoned radiocomputer on the other side of the nave, pulsing with light. Then he shakes his head.

links.title: Tiago: ""No, man, quite the opposite -- I d..."
links.text: "No, man, quite the opposite -- I don't think she cares much about authority or, anything else for that matter. Maybe only about her machines."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see." The lieutenant seems conte..."
links.text: "I see." The lieutenant seems contented with that answer. "And where is she now?"

links.title: Tiago: ""I told you, homes -- I don't know.""
links.text: "I told you, homes -- I don't know."

links.title: You: ""Did it seem like she was hiding in..."
links.text: "Did it seem like she was hiding in here? Or running from something?"

links.title: Tiago: ""You mean like a fugitive?" He glan..."
links.text: "You mean like a fugitive?" He glances at the abandoned radiocomputer on the other side of the nave, pulsing with light. Then he shakes his head.

links.title: Tiago: ""No, man, quite the opposite -- I d..."
links.text: "No, man, quite the opposite -- I don't think she cares much about authority or, anything else for that matter. Maybe only about her machines."

links.title: You: ""And you don't know where she is?""
links.text: "And you don't know where she is?"

links.title: Tiago: ""That's what I said, homes.""
links.text: "That's what I said, homes."

links.title: You: ""How can you not know that when you..."
links.text: "How can you not know that when you both live here?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Don't really follow her comings an..."
links.text: "Don't really follow her comings and goings. Just see her typing on her computer now and then. We've got different interests."

links.title: You: ""So you've got nothing else to tell..."
links.text: "So you've got nothing else to tell me? How she looks, what she does, who *is* she?"

links.title: Tiago: ""I'm afraid not, ese. You just have..."
links.text: "I'm afraid not, ese. You just have to wait until she comes back or..." He shrugs.

links.title: You: ""Right, thanks. I'll see if I can f..."
links.text: "Right, thanks. I'll see if I can find her some other way..."

links.title: Tiago: ""You just have to wait until she co..."
links.text: "You just have to wait until she comes back or..." He shrugs.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Or search through her radiocomputer..."
links.text: Or search through her radiocomputer.

links.title: You: ""What was that about coffee? I feel..."
links.text: "What was that about coffee? I feel like I've heard it somewhere before..."

links.title: Tiago: ""Look, man. I'm at liberty to talk..."
links.text: "Look, man. I'm at liberty to talk about the sacred blaze of the Mother's glorious heart. But not about the coffee."

links.title: You: ""Okay then, thanks." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Okay then, thanks." [Leave.]

links.title: Tiago: ""I think we're done here, ese." The..."
links.text: "I think we're done here, ese." The figure crawls off into the darkness above.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That was... an interesting convers..."
links.text: "That was... an interesting conversation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""However, I'm still not sure whethe..."
links.text: "However, I'm still not sure whether we'll find our suspect here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""However, I'm still not sure how it..."
links.text: "However, I'm still not sure how it's relevant to our investigation."

dialogueTree.title: Tiago: ""You've come back to face your caco..."
dialogueTree.text: "You've come back to face your cacodaemons. Good. You ain't gonna outrun them if you don't drop the bottle."

links.title: You: ""Why do you keep talking about alco..."
links.text: "Why do you keep talking about alcohol?"

links.title: Tiago: ""*Est√°s crudo*, wey. I see deep ins..."
links.text: "*Est√°s crudo*, wey. I see deep inside you. Your body and spirit are suffering greatly from *overindulgment* and you don't even know it."

links.title: You: ""Great. More patronising. So origin..."
links.text: "Great. More patronising. So original."

links.title: Tiago: ""I know it's hard to admit that you..."
links.text: "I know it's hard to admit that you've got a problem. I was like you once -- couldn't take an honest look into my own heart and see I was in pain."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know, actually, since we're he..."
links.text: "You know, actually, since we're here -- you may want to pay attention to what the ceiling climber is saying."

links.title: Volition: "If the lieutenant agrees, then mayb..."
links.text: If the lieutenant agrees, then maybe, just maybe -- you should pay attention?

links.title: Volition: "You know, he may be strange, but yo..."
links.text: You know, he may be strange, but you might want to pay attention to what he's saying.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Look at these crazies. What is this..."
links.text: Look at these crazies. What is this, a fucking intervention?

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Fuck you, crab-man, you don't tell..."
links.text: Fuck you, crab-man, you don't tell us what to do. Tell him.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Look at these crazies. What is this..."
links.text: Look at these crazies. What is this shit?

links.title: You: ""For some reason I feel like you ha..."
links.text: "For some reason I feel like you have a point there."

links.title: Tiago: ""Don't trust me -- trust the Mother..."
links.text: "Don't trust me -- trust the Mother. I'm only the messenger, homes." His voice echoes in the cold air of the church.

links.title: Tiago: ""Don't trust me -- trust the Mother..."
links.text: "Don't trust me -- trust the Mother. I'm only the messenger, homes." His voice echoes in the cold air of the church.

links.title: You: ""Who do you think you are? Some cra..."
links.text: "Who do you think you are? Some crazy guy under the roof? What is this shit?"

links.title: Tiago: ""It don't matter who *I* am, wey. I..."
links.text: "It don't matter who *I* am, wey. I'm just bringin' you the message of the Mother's love. She don't want you to hang yourself on your own stubbornness." His words echo in the cold air of the church.

links.title: Tiago: ""This is the Church of the Mother o..."
links.text: "This is the Church of the Mother of Silence. You are welcome here." He sways gently on the beams, waiting for you to take it all in.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You have no idea what the fuck he's..."
links.text: You have no idea what the fuck he's talking about. Is he just trying to throw you off your game?

links.title: Composure: "Whatever it is, he's quite confiden..."
links.text: Whatever it is, he's quite confident about it -- just look how gracefully he sways.

links.title: Drama: "'Tis not an act, my liege -- saving..."
links.text: 'Tis not an act, my liege -- saving, perchance, he hath deceived his very self. This man is a zealot.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This Mother of Silence sounds like..."
links.text: This Mother of Silence sounds like a serious player. You might want to be careful, until you find out what you're dealing with.

links.title: You: ""You know, alcohol is central to my..."
links.text: "You know, alcohol is central to my identity. If I wouldn't drink I just wouldn't be *me*."

links.title: Tiago: ""The grave's comin' for your little..."
links.text: "The grave's comin' for your little 'identity' sooner than you think, homes." He shakes his head sadly. "You sure you're ready? The Mother could set you free from all that shit." His words echo in the cold air of the church.

links.title: You: ""This is stupid. I don't even know..."
links.text: "This is stupid. I don't even know what this is."

links.title: Tiago: ""You know what this is. It's truth,..."
links.text: "You know what this is. It's truth, homes. Join me, become one with it -- aflame with the Mother's love." His voice echoes in the cold air of the church.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, what does that even mean?"
links.text: Wait, what does that even mean?

links.title: You: ""That's all well and good, but we n..."
links.text: "That's all well and good, but we need to talk about the unlicensed occupation of ecclesiastic property."

links.title: Tiago: ""The only thing we need to talk abo..."
links.text: "The only thing we need to talk about is how the Mother can really help you, homes." His voice echoes in the cold air of the church.

links.title: You: ""Oh, I'm very in touch with my suff..."
links.text: "Oh, I'm very in touch with my suffering."

links.title: Tiago: ""Not all of it. I was like you once..."
links.text: "Not all of it. I was like you once. You don't know all the havoc *el vino* is wreaking on your mind and your spirit. Necesitas parar, homie."

links.title: You: ""How do you know what I'm feeling?""
links.text: "How do you know what I'm feeling?"

links.title: Tiago: ""I was like you once -- just draggi..."
links.text: "I was like you once -- just dragging my feet to the next bottle... Shit was dark, homes."

links.title: You: ""This conversation is making me unc..."
links.text: "This conversation is making me uncomfortable. Let's talk about something else."

links.title: Tiago: ""I know it's hard to admit that you..."
links.text: "I know it's hard to admit that you have a problem... I was like you once -- couldn't take an honest look at the damage *el vino* was doing to my mind and my spirit."

links.title: You: ""This is tiresome." [ Leave.]"
links.text: "This is tiresome." [ Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Tiago: "Is that... a man? Looks more like p..."
dialogueTree.text: Is that... a man? Looks more like part of the carpentry of the building came alive and is now studying you intently.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The crab-man!"
links.text: The crab-man!

links.title: You: ""Hey, who's there?""
links.text: "Hey, who's there?"

links.title: Tiago: "The man leans forward a little, fix..."
links.text: The man leans forward a little, fixing you with a steady, unreadable gaze, then speaks...

links.title: Tiago: ""Habitual alcohol use has made you..."
links.text: "Habitual alcohol use has made you into a scared little pussy, homes. But don't worry, everything's gonna be alright -- you've come to the right place."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "That accent is Villalobos -- a peni..."
links.text: That accent is Villalobos -- a peninsula in Mesque *and* a district in Jamrock. There's a sizable contingent of Villalobos-speaking mesques in Revachol.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Hold on, stop it right there. "Puss..."
links.text: Hold on, stop it right there. "Pussy"? What's with this?

links.title: You: ""I'm not scared. I just don't under..."
links.text: "I'm not scared. I just don't understand why the female sexual organs have to be associated with weakness."

links.title: Tiago: ""You've really got a case of frayed..."
links.text: "You've really got a case of frayed nerves. *Pussy* in this usage comes from *pusillanimous*. Everybody knows that."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Uhm.... oops?"
links.text: Uhm.... oops?

links.title: Tiago: ""Chill out, man. Here you can recei..."
links.text: "Chill out, man. Here you can receive the Mother's love, and, when you're ready, she will take your hand and lift you out of the despair at the bottom of the bottle."

links.title: You: "Hold your peace."
links.text: Hold your peace.

links.title: You: ""The right place for what?""
links.text: "The right place for what?"

links.title: Tiago: ""Here you can receive the Mother's..."
links.text: "Here you can receive the Mother's love, and, when you're ready, she will take your hand and lift you out of the despair at the bottom of the bottle."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant whispers to you, qui..."
links.text: The lieutenant whispers to you, quietly. "This man is obviously a habitual narcotics user. Do we really need to question him?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I'm put off by this religious stuff..."
links.text: I'm put off by this religious stuff, he thinks -- and maybe the ceiling-climbing, too. It's all very hard to square with the lieutenant's own view of reality.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Hey and what was that about *the bo..."
links.text: Hey and what was that about *the bottle* again? You haven't even drank that much lately! Lay off it already. Sheesh.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I guess I have a bit of a pr..."
links.text: "Yeah, I guess I have a bit of a problem, and it's been getting out of hand lately, but..."

links.title: You: ""I'm a police man. I need to talk t..."
links.text: "I'm a police man. I need to talk to you about police things. I don't know anything about 'alcohol use.'"

links.title: Tiago: ""Oh yeah, sure." His eyes remain fi..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, sure." His eyes remain fixed on yours. "You don't know anything about alcohol use. You've got it *all under control*, wey. I can smell the control all the way over here."

links.title: You: ""I'm doing just fine, thank you!""
links.text: "I'm doing just fine, thank you!"

links.title: Tiago: ""I know it's hard to admit that you..."
links.text: "I know it's hard to admit that you've got a problem. I was like you once -- couldn't take an honest look into my own heart and see I was in pain."

links.title: You: ""Okay, fine, I'm struggling. But yo..."
links.text: "Okay, fine, I'm struggling. But you don't need to lecture me -- I know what I need to do."

links.title: Tiago: ""Not all of it. I was like you once..."
links.text: "Not all of it. I was like you once. You don't know all the havoc *el vino* is wreaking on your mind and your spirit. Necesitas parar, homie."

links.title: You: ""You don't know me. You don't know..."
links.text: "You don't know me. You don't know what I've been through!"

links.title: Tiago: ""I was like you once -- just draggi..."
links.text: "I was like you once -- just dragging my feet to the next bottle... Shit was dark, homes."

links.title: You: ""This conversation is making me unc..."
links.text: "This conversation is making me uncomfortable. Let's talk about something else."

links.title: Tiago: ""I know it's hard to admit that you..."
links.text: "I know it's hard to admit that you have a problem... I was like you once -- couldn't take an honest look at the damage *el vino* was doing to my mind and my spirit."

links.title: You: ""I'm a police man. I need to talk t..."
links.text: "I'm a police man. I need to talk to you about police things. I don't know anything about 'alcohol use.'" (Hide the bottle behind your back.)

links.title: Tiago: ""Oh yeah, sure." His eyes remain fi..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, sure." His eyes remain fixed on yours. "You don't know anything about alcohol use. You've got it *all under control*, wey. I saw you hide that control behind your back."

links.title: You: ""Oh, hell no!" [Run away.]"
links.text: "Oh, hell no!" [Run away.]

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's a born preacher. Enjoy the rhe..."
links.text: He's a born preacher. Enjoy the rhetorical flourishes, but remain vigilant -- don't let him get too close. He's crazy.

links.title: You: "Wait, what qualifies as *too* close..."
links.text: Wait, what qualifies as *too* close?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Giving away all of your possessions..."
links.text: Giving away all of your possessions,  sacrificing a limb to appease an angry god, trying to live on air and light alone as though you were some kind of plant...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Hey, you already practically sacrif..."
links.text: Hey, you already practically sacrificed a limb when you got shot in the tribunal... it's nothing major!

links.title: You: "I think I'm willing to try crazy. A..."
links.text: I think I'm willing to try crazy. Anything to stop this suffering.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Seems it's already too late. Have f..."
links.text: Seems it's already too late. Have fun on the kooky train.

links.title: You: "Vigilance is practically my middle..."
links.text: Vigilance is practically my middle name. I won't let anyone talk me into anything unreasonable.

links.title: Rhetoric: "That's right. You've got to watch y..."
links.text: That's right. You've got to watch your own back.

links.title: You: ""What are you doing here?""
links.text: "What are you doing here?"

links.title: Tiago: ""I'm here to receive the Mother's l..."
links.text: "I'm here to receive the Mother's love. You can, too, homes. And, when you're ready, she will take your hand and lift you out of the despair at the bottom of the bottle."

links.title: You: ""This is the police. Show yourself!""
links.text: "This is the police. Show yourself!"

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Be quiet for now."
links.text: Say nothing. Be quiet for now.

links.title: You: ""Uhm... are you the crab-man?""
links.text: "Uhm... are you the crab-man?"
